long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Metadocs is a tool to discuss any documentation "in place".

Rather than discuss the documentation in a separate forum, you can discuss it right in the documentation itself.

Go to any webpage, and click on the metadocs icon in the toolbar. 

Please note that metadocs is currently in beta. If you find any bugs, please contact support.
